resources.string: Minions Stuart, Kevin and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a super-villain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.

I\'ve seen this movie and I\'m very impressed and no lie Leonardo has done a magnificent job playing his role has a vengeful father. This movie has some things to teach everyone what they shouldn\'t do and also it was worthwhile watching. Bring your family and friends to see this movie. I promise you, you will not regret a second watching the story play
